---
title: "About"
---

This site has been generated with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/), [Jupyter](https://jupyter.org) and [Julia](https://www.https://julialang.org/) (version 1.9). 

Main used packages are [MethodOfLines.jl](https://docs.sciml.ai/MethodOfLines/stable/), [ModelingToolkit.jl](https://docs.sciml.ai/ModelingToolkit/stable/), [OrdinaryDiffEq.jl](https://docs.sciml.ai/OrdinaryDiffEq/stable/)  and [Plots.jl](https://docs.juliaplots.org/stable/).
